function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission risk due to traditional HVAC systems","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use of innovative heating systems and ventilation designs","Technologies":"Innovative heating systems, ground source heat pumps, solar-powered disinfected wall systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners"},{"Description":"Viral aerosols transmitted via building drainage system","Impact":"Facilitates transmission of airborne infections","Mitigation":"Repair faulty floor drains, improve ventilation in drainage system, redesign plumbing system","Technologies":"Improved floor drains, enhanced ventilation systems, redesigned plumbing systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Building maintenance teams, plumbers, building owners"}]}
